title: With the best of intentions
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Robin Hughes and Bill Steller
brief_description: This film looks at the lives of children growing up in different environments. Compares two professional Sydney families to show how broader social developments and conflicts are reflected in middle-class approaches to child rearing.
